name: Tank Time (demo)
description:
Beat enemy’s and get points to spend on upgrading your tank so you don’t lose! The     enemy’s get stronger and angrier every round so be careful what you buy!

 This game is a top down round based shooter where each round you get a point to spend on upgrades, power ups, or super upgrades which cost lots but there overpowered.

Beat enemy’s and don’t die!

CONTROLS
WASD or joystick 

The tank will face towards the mouse

On mobile you tank faces the opposite direction of where your moving (trust me this makes it LOTS easier)

Tips and tricks
Power ups are helpful but using too much early game can make it so you don’t have enough stuff upgraded late game
You get one point per round
Supers cost 5+supers bought
Use the in game tutorial for some reason everyone I showed this to did not and they were confused because they did not use the tutorial 

NOTE
this is only a demo! The final game will have TONS more features like the final secret super tons more enemy’s different difficulty’s and more!

FULL GAME RELEASE DATEthe full game is planned to be released around Christmas but no promises, I am only one developer trying to make this huge game so if it gets delayed please don’t be mad
